tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MovementHistory ( 
  movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  robot_id INT NOT NULL, 
  movement_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  movement_description TEXT, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robot(robot_id) 
);
CREATE TABLE Robot (robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY, robot_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), movement_type VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE MovementHistory (movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, robot_id INT, movement_description TEXT, movement_timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE RobotStatus (status_id INT PRIMARY KEY, robot_id INT, battery_level DECIMAL(5,2), operational_status VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE robot (id INT PRIMARY KEY,name VARCHAR(50),location VARCHAR(50),timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE movement_history (movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,robot_id INT,timestamp TIMESTAMP,direction VARCHAR(10));
CREATE TABLE commands (command_id INT PRIMARY KEY,robot_id INT,command VARCHAR(50),timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,robot_id INT,sensor_type VARCHAR(20),reading FLOAT,timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE errors (error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,robot_id INT,error_message VARCHAR(100),timestamp TIMESTAMP);
